articles.author: Jessica Hamzelou
articles.title: Drugs that help our cells tidy up might extend lifespan
articles.description: Ramping up the body’s ability to remove damaged cells has been found to stave off organ damage and cancer in mice – could a drug get the same effect in humans?

articles.author: Joelle Renstrom
articles.title: We need to grab some rocks from Mars – let’s just get on with it
articles.description: A mission to collect samples from the Red Planet and return them to Earth is our best chance of finding life on Mars, says Joelle Renstrom

articles.author: Clare Wilson
articles.title: Women aren’t being told real risks of cervical cancer screening
articles.description: Efforts to prevent cervical cancer seem so straightforward that few women question them, but unnecessary treatment can cause miscarriages and premature births

articles.title: Papua New Guinea bans Facebook for a month in fake news blitz
articles.description: The country is planning a month-long Facebook shutdown to conduct research on the social media network, weed out fake users and stem "false or misleading” information

articles.author: Douglas Vakoch
articles.title: I’m working on a universal language to let us speak to aliens
articles.description: It's time to find a new way to speak across the stars, says Douglas Vakoch, head of METI, the body dedicated to messaging possible alien civilisations

articles.title: GM golden rice gets approval from food regulators in the US
articles.description: The genetically modified rice, designed to prevent blindness in undernourished children, was judged safe to eat last week by the US Food and Drug Administration

articles.author: Timothy Revell
articles.title: AI inspired by the film Spotlight could track down child abusers
articles.description: Journalists at the Boston Globe painstakingly sifted patterns in public records to find priests who had sexually abused children. Now an AI might do the same

articles.author: Catherine Brahic
articles.title: Mystery ghost ape species found hidden in bonobo’s genome
articles.description: A comparison of chimpanzee genomes has found signs that a previously unknown species of chimpanzee once lived in the forests of central Africa

articles.author: Colin Barras
articles.title: Pigeons can understand probabilities – just like primates can
articles.description: We know that humans and some other primates can instinctively distinguish between high and low probabilities – now pigeons have shown they might share the skill

articles.author: Michael Le Page
articles.title: Wish you had perfect pitch? You may be able to learn it
articles.description: Mozart had it, Mariah Carey has it – now you can have it too. A study suggests that some adults may be able to learn perfect pitch in just a few weeks
